definitions.definition: A saw that is designed to cut wood along its grain , i.e. to rip , to execute a rip cut .
A genre of music played with a ripsaw and other instruments, originally associated mainly with Turks and Caicos Islands .

main_definition: ( woodworking ) A saw that is designed to cut wood along its grain , i.e. to rip , to execute a rip cut .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , music , Caribbean ) A genre of music played with a ripsaw and other instruments, originally associated mainly with Turks and Caicos Islands .
